main.name: Reyam
main.description: In general, I like anything related to data science, some of my colleagues called me the Queen of data in a way to describe how much I like to work with DATA. My passion for science, started when I was a child, I liked technologies a lot, I used to try to figure out how the computer components linked to each other, in the meantime, I was trying to fix the broking electronic devices. I'm a fast learner, very keen and committed person, I always have a clear target, my life revolve around ACHIEVEMENTS
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

education.description: I did Master’s Degree in Artificial Intelligence full time course in Glasgow United Kingdom. My specialized coursework and projects at Strathclyde include AI applied to areas such as finance, planning and data analytics.

education.degree: Bachelor degree of Computer and Informatics engineering
education.description: During 5 years I learnt, explored and built a wide range of Projects and Applications that involived different topics such as Networking,Logical,Databases,Algorithms,Programming,security.The Bachelor's graduation project was a web application for council by asp.net with sql-serve

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Responsive website for Next of Kin by using React, Gatsby, Netlify.it is a team work based on collaborative using Github

work.title: ​Media consultant
work.description: Develop media plans and policies with executives in the organisation, Draft press releases, news, and magazine articles, Work on various applications, such as database management or word processing. Was responsible for events management and prepared speeches for concerned people. Directed public relations campaigns for the company

work.title: ​Program Coordinator
work.description: Manage tv programs preparations and was part of the supervision team when it was live.Provided detailed reports regarding the programs.Provided various training to new staff. Writing documentaries, one of them talked about Libya’spolitical history, especially the war between the Sinusian family and the Italians

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
